item.title: Serenity
item.description: [[songs/a/alaska_highway/closure/event_horizon_hybrid_mix.md#youll-be-melted-by-the-sun-vyl-wnanory|As I sit here]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/closure/event_horizon_hybrid_mix.md#youll-be-melted-by-the-sun-vyl-wnanory|And slowly close my eyes]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/closure/event_horizon_hybrid_mix.md#youll-be-melted-by-the-sun-vyl-wnanory|I take another deep breath]] [[songs/a/alaska_highway/closure/event_horizon_hybrid_mix.md#youll-be-melted-by-the-sun-vyl-wnanory|And feel the wind pass through my body]] Â [[songs/w/wovenwar/wovenwar/death_to_rights.
